testimonial.author_designation: Supported laboratory test preparations and analyzed data using specialized software like SAP. Provided crucial insights to quality control procedures and maintained accurate records for quality documentation.

Responsible for gathering data from various sources, ensuring accuracy through cleaning and transformation. Analyze data to identify patterns and create well-structured reports to effectively communicate analysis results.
